thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Poor services
thread.title_full: Poor services - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: petersB1904VO
title: Poor services
text: HH members don't look to be recognized when checking in or a smile from someone helping. Beware of parking cost as if you have a small SUV they will hit you with a higher price and you need to park the car. Disappointing and not what I expect from Hilton or have experience in the past.
